title: Just Give In
description: Lena and Rory gave each other everything— their virginity and all their love. It isn’t until Rory leaves for a job opportunity that Lena finds out she’s pregnant.When Rory gets a call from Lena and finds out she had a miscarriage, he knows nothing will hold him back from getting to her.Lena knows she needs to tell Rory the truth about the plans she had before she lost their baby. What she hadn’t realized was how much she wanted something until it was gone. With heartache, confusion, and the truth being held back, can Rory and Lena get through their hard times or will they tear them apart?
author: Jenika Snow
